translation.en: On my way.
Seriously?
It's a holiday.
Bad guys don't take a holiday.
translation.fr:
Les méchants ne prennent pas
de congés.

translation.en: Go back to sleep.
I was hoping we could talk.
Yeah, I gotta go.
So you're still upset?
I'm not upset. I'm just late.
translation.fr:
Je ne suis pas fâché.
Seulement en retard.

translation.en: Call you later?
ELLEN: The Monfell Shipping Center
translation.fr:
CENTRE D'ENTRAÎNEMENT
TACTIQUE Le dock de Monfell n'est plus exploité
depuis six mois.

translation.en: has been non-operational for the last six months.
translation.fr:
Le dock de Monfell n'est plus exploité
depuis six mois.

translation.en: Since its closure, it's become a favorite location
translation.fr:
Il est devenu un point stratégique
pour les Locos

translation.en: for Sao Paulo Locos to conduct business.
translation.fr:
Il est devenu un point stratégique
pour les Locos de São Paulo.

translation.en: They've come and gone as they please with minimal resistance.
translation.fr: Ils vont et viennent à leur guise.

translation.en: That ends today.
translation.fr: Aujourd'hui, on y met un terme.

translation.en: Late last night, a shipping container arrived at Monfell from Bogotá.
translation.fr:
Cette nuit, un conteneur
est arrivé de Bogotá.

translation.en: Due to the amount of chatter, DEA believes
this could be their largest shipment of contraband to date.
translation.fr:
qu'il s'agit d'une grosse livraison
de contrebande.

translation.en: The source couldn't identify exactly what was coming in.
translation.fr: La source n'a pas pu préciser.

translation.en: So whether it's money, arms, or the ghost of Pablo Escobar, be ready.
translation.fr: Dans tous les cas, tenez-vous prêts.

translation.en: Secure the scene, help find the container.
Once you've done that, you all can go enjoy your holiday.
translation.fr:
Après ça, vous pourrez profiter
de votre congé.

translation.en: TRAVIS: We're just barbecuing.
It's a whole thing.
How about you? SOPHIA: I don't have any plans.
translation.fr:
- Et toi ?
- Je n'ai rien de prévu.

translation.en: You should come over. Yeah?
Yeah. Carley and Becky would love to see you.
Not me. I'm sick to death of you.
translation.fr: Pas moi. Je te vois assez.

translation.en: Sorry to ruin your holiday.
You ruin every day, El. Why should today be an exception?
Don't call me "El."
When did this come down?
Got a call from DEA at 2. Why?
translation.fr: Les Stups ont appelé à 2 h.

translation.en: TRAVIS: A little short notice. ELLEN: We've had shorter.
translation.fr:
- C'est court.
- On a vu pire.

translation.en: Don't get that big brain of yours thinking, Travis. It only gets you in trouble.
translation.fr:
Ne cogite pas trop.
Ça t'attire des ennuis.

translation.en: Inspiring as always. ELLEN: And don't fuck up.
translation.fr:
- Très motivant.
- Et pas de conneries.

translation.en: Let's go.
Ward? Hello?
WARD: What's this? PHOENIX: What we're looking for.
Yeah, it's pretty. BENSON: Hey, Chu.
Why don't you come down to the beach later?
translation.fr:
J'organise une fête sur la plage,
viens.

translation.en: I'm having a party. No, I got plans.
translation.fr:
J'organise une fête sur la plage,
viens. Je suis prise.

translation.en: BENSON: It's your loss. PHIL: Benson.
Why would she go to your party? Aren't you too old for this?
translation.fr:
- Pourquoi elle irait ?
- Tu es vieux.

translation.en: Just entering my prime. [LAUGHTER]
Yo, I'm not doing anything. How come I didn't get an invite?
translation.fr: Pourquoi je n'ai pas été invité ?

translation.en: Remember what happened last time you came?
translation.fr: Tu te rappelles la dernière fois ?

translation.en: No. Ask his wife.
All right, simmer down. Simmer down.
translation.fr: On se calme. On se calme.

translation.en: A little calm-before-the-storm levity.
There's not gonna be a storm.
translation.fr: Il n'y aura pas de tempête.

translation.en: What makes you say that? They've been getting lazy.
We've been letting them do a few scores, and now they feel safe.
Well, I guess we got all dolled up for nothing.
translation.fr: Alors on s'est pomponnés pour rien.

translation.en: TRAVIS [OVER COMM]: I don't give a damn what the DEA says.
translation.fr:
Je me fous
de ce que disent les Stups.

translation.en: We go in heavy, stay frosty.
Watch each other's backs
stick to the plan, stay tight.
translation.fr: on suit le plan, on reste groupés.

translation.en: Let's do this.
CHU: Drop the phone and keep your hands where I can see them.
translation.fr:
Lâchez le téléphone,
les mains en évidence.

translation.en: That was sloppy, Chu.
WARD: All, we have guard one on lockdown. Surveillance is ours.
translation.fr:
Premier garde maîtrisé.
On a la surveillance.

translation.en: TRAVIS [OVER COMM]: Copy.
WARD: The yard's clear.
We got another guard on the east-side stairwell.
translation.fr:
Un autre garde
dans l'escalier côté est.

translation.en: [GUNS COCKING] CHU: Hands! Now.
MAN: Clear.
Knees.
How many others are there?
Sophie, anything?
Nothing. This was supposed to be a shipping yard.
translation.fr: Rien. C'est censé être un dock.

translation.en: I don't see any containers. TRAVIS: Copy that.
Come on, do you have to do that?
translation.fr: Vous êtes obligée de faire ça ?

translation.en: Sorry.
You sure this is the right place?
This is the place.
Let's go.
Jackpot. Copy. Where are you?
Outside. Northwest side of the warehouse.
Copy. Ward, stay where you are.
Everyone else, meet at the shipping container.
Copy that.
Look to your left.
Copy. Straight ahead, guys.
translation.fr: Bien reçu. Droit devant, les gars.

translation.en: I've got 10 to 12 hostiles coming in hot from inside the warehouse.
translation.fr:
J'ai une douzaine d'individus hostiles
en visuel.

translation.en: [GUNFIRE] WARD: Take cover! Take cover!
SOPHIA: Take cover!
Cover me.
You okay? I'm all right.
I got you covered. Go.
PHIL: Gotta get her out!
translation.fr: Il faut la sortir de là.

translation.en: Stay down. You're gonna be okay.
Are you hit?
Just got the vest.
translation.fr: C'est le gilet qui a pris.

translation.en: Cover. Go, go, go.
Now you're both being sloppy.
You owe me a beer.
MAN: Let go! Let go! Little help here.
My arm!
My arm! Yard's secure.
My arm!
What the fuck?
It's a fucking suicide vest.
What are you wearing this for? Go fuck yourself.
Inside's secure.
What the fuck?
PHOENIX [ON COMM]: We need an ambulance!
TRAVIS [ON COMM]: I'm on it.
Fuck. Phil.
I got Phoenix. Let me see if it went through your vest.
translation.fr:
Je regarde
si ça a traversé ton gilet.

translation.en: I got you.
"It's not gonna be a storm."
Cover!
Cut him down.
TRAVIS: I don't know why some crazy motherfucker
would put on a suicide vest.
That's not our problem anymore.
translation.fr: Mais ce n'est plus notre problème.

translation.en: All right, fine.
Let go! Let go! My arm! SOPHIA: That's Diego.
He won't shut up, and the guy we cut down's not talking.
translation.fr:
Il ne la boucle pas,
et l'autre ne parle pas.

translation.en: What'd Dwyer say?
She's sending a wagon.
What? Why?
She wants us to bring 'em in.
I thought this was DEA. The DEA guys are dead.
translation.fr:
- Et les gars des Stups ?
- Tous morts.

translation.en: She can't get a hold of brass.
translation.fr: Elle n'a pas eu de gradé.

translation.en: Fucking Fourth. Until she does, we hang onto 'em.
translation.fr: Journée de merde. En attendant, on les garde.

translation.en: We should keep 'em. Fuck the DEA.
Fuck them all. These assholes killed Phil.
They should defer to us. We're bringing 'em in.
translation.fr:
- Ils sont à nous.
- On les embarque.

translation.en: SOPHIA: What a mess.
LARS: Most people are under the impression
that since the Southern states were in favor of slavery,
that they insisted on the Three-Fifths Compromise
translation.fr:
il a voulu
le compromis des trois-cinquièmes,

translation.en: found in Article 1, Section 2 of the Constitution
that determined that slaves are only worth three-fifths a person.
translation.fr:
selon lequel un esclave
vaut trois cinquièmes d'un homme.

translation.en: It was, in fact, the North that did this.
translation.fr: En fait, c'était une demande du Nord.

translation.en: The South would have loved to have counted each slave twice,
translation.fr:
Le Sud aurait adoré
compter chaque esclave deux fois,

translation.en: and the North, rightly so,
translation.fr: et le Nord, à juste titre,

translation.en: didn't believe that the slaves that didn't have the right to vote
translation.fr:
pensait qu'un esclave
sans droit de vote

translation.en: should count equally to those that did.
translation.fr: ne pouvait compter comme un citoyen.

translation.en: That would've given the South more power
translation.fr:
Cela aurait donné au Sud
plus d'influence

translation.en: to put their influence on the North.
And what's your point?
I thought we were chatting.
[PHONE BEEPS ON] Yes?
MAN [ALTERED VOICE]: You've come an awful long way for nothing.
translation.fr: Vous êtes venu de très loin pour rien.

translation.en: It's not that far. Who is this?
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas si loin. Qui est-ce ?

translation.en: Just listen.
Diego fucked up.
He lost Scorpion.
And you have him?
MAN [ON SPEAKER]: Not that simple.
But I know where he is and how to get him.
translation.fr: Mais je sais comment le récupérer.

translation.en: Fifty million.
We both know he's worth 10 times that.
translation.fr: Il vaut dix fois cette somme.

translation.en: I don't think this is a game you wanna play.
translation.fr: Ne jouez pas à ce petit jeu.

translation.en: You don't know who you're dealing...
translation.fr:
- Vous ignorez à qui...
- Je rappellerai.

translation.en: I'll be in touch with instructions.
translation.fr:
- Vous ignorez à qui...
- Je rappellerai. Appel terminé

translation.en: ...with.
Two hundred years ago, it was so much easier to buy a human being.
translation.fr:
C'était plus facile d'acheter
un humain il y a 200 ans.

translation.en: Check out his story. If it's true?
It's a fucking Scorpion.
I don't wanna lose him.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas le perdre.

translation.en: Not now. Not again.
TRAVIS: York.
We're short-handed. Help Sophie process our guests.
Got it, Commander.
My arm! It's fucking broken. I'll break your other one. Move it.
translation.fr:
- Mon bras est cassé.
- Je te briserai l'autre.

translation.en: Move.
I thought I made myself clear.
We got jumped, and not by some--
You say that, and all I hear is you weren't prepared.
What happened? Your team take it easy because it's a holiday?
translation.fr: Ton équipe se la coule douce ?

translation.en: What was the DEA onto? What do you mean?
translation.fr:
Que voulaient les Stups ? - Comment ça ?
- C'est n'importe quoi.

translation.en: Come on, Ellen. This is so fucked.
Clearly, they weren't honest with us. All we know is what they told us.
translation.fr:
- Ils nous ont dupés.
- On ne sait rien de plus.

translation.en: They acted on a tip that 500 million in product was moving through Monfell.
translation.fr:
Il devait y avoir
pour 500 millions de produit.

translation.en: And what's it turn out to be?
A guy in a box.
Protected by heavily armed Sao Paulo Locos soldiers--
translation.fr: Protégé par des soldats des Locos...

translation.en: Their tip was wrong. What do you want me to say?
That doesn't make them fucking liars.
translation.fr: Ils n'ont pas menti pour autant.

translation.en: So what do we do now?
I have calls in. No one's around.
translation.fr: J'ai appelé. Il n'y a personne.

translation.en: Until we get answers, we sit tight.
Fuck that. I'm gonna talk to them. No, you're not.
You're gonna leave them be.
They're the feds' problem. Jesus Christ.
Phil is dead. Don't you wanna know why?
translation.fr:
Phil est mort.
Tu ne veux pas une explication ?

translation.en: Right now all I'm thinking about is what I'm gonna tell his family.
translation.fr:
Ma seule préoccupation
est ce que je vais dire à sa famille.

translation.en: Elevator to lobby. Fine.
translation.fr: L'ascenseur pour le hall d'entrée. Bien.

translation.en: Lobby, please.
[DOOR BUZZES] Watch those sudden stops, boy!
Somebody could get hurt.
It's a big place.
And they've got their Christmas decorations up already.
translation.fr:
Et ils ont déjà accroché
les décorations de Noël.

translation.en: LARS: Nicholas.
Uh, Mr. C, I wasn't...
Make yourselves at home.
Welcome.
Confound it, somebody better nail that down.
Could take a nasty fall from a loose board.
Oh, I just...
Lord help the whole thing.
Nicholas. Did you do what I asked?
translation.fr: Tu as fait ce que j'ai demandé ?

translation.en: Yes, yes. Yes.
I did. Let me just show you.
So I was able to tap into a security camera across from the shipping center.
translation.fr:
J'ai pu me connecter
à une caméra en face des docks.

translation.en: Where did they take him?
S.W.A.T.'s got him back at their place.
It's their renovated facility in the middle of nowhere.
translation.fr:
Dans leur centre
au milieu de nulle part.

translation.en: Sounds like the paint isn't even dry yet. How do you know?
translation.fr:
- Flambant neuf.
- Comment tu le sais ?

translation.en: I heard it on my police scanner.
translation.fr: J'ai capté la fréquence de la police.

translation.en: LARS: Well done, Nicholas.
Now...
Can you trace the number that called this phone?
Find out who and where they are?
translation.fr: Savoir qui a appelé et d'où ?

translation.en: I can try. Try hard.
translation.fr:
- Je peux essayer.
- Mieux que ça.

translation.en: Of course. No problem.
ELLEN: Melissa, Phil pulled Phoenix out of harm's way just before he got shot.
translation.fr:
Melissa, Phil a reçu une balle
alors qu'il aidait Phoenix.

translation.en: He was a hero.
Yes.
You have my word.
Whoever's responsible for this is gonna pay.
TRAVIS [ON PHONE]: I'm sorry, I can't leave now.
No, I understand. Should I cancel today?
translation.fr:
Je comprends.
Je dois annuler la fête ?

translation.en: No, don't do that.
You okay? Yeah. Yeah.
Travis?
Yeah?
I'm really sorry.
I love you.
It's our turn in the neighborhood
to host the holiday barbecue,
translation.fr:
On organise le barbecue annuel, alors Carley prépare à manger
pour 22 enfants et leurs parents.

translation.en: so Carley's at home making the food for 22 kids and their parents.
translation.fr:
alors Carley prépare à manger
pour 22 enfants et leurs parents.

translation.en: What's up? Elson called. Said to come down.
SOPHIA: Carley still mad at you?
She's not mad at me.
Sorry, man, I'm on her side.
What--? There's no side. She's not mad at me.
translation.fr: Il n'y a pas de camp.

translation.en: Besides, you can't be on her side. You're my partner.
translation.fr: Et puis tu es ma coéquipière.

translation.en: That's a brotherhood.
Yeah, but Carley's like my sister.
Sisterhood trumps brotherhood-- That's bullshit.
Look,
you decided before you got married that you only wanted one kid, right?
translation.fr:
vous aviez décidé
de n'avoir qu'un enfant.

translation.en: Yeah. That was like 10 years ago.
But out of the blue, you say you want another kid.
translation.fr: Et d'un coup, tu en veux un autre.

translation.en: Yeah, I said maybe we could think about having another kid,
translation.fr:
J'ai dit
qu'on pourrait peut-être y penser,

translation.en: then it became-- You wanna know what she heard?
translation.fr:
- et là...
- Elle a entendu quoi ?

translation.en: You wanna have another baby that she'll have to carry for nine months.
translation.fr:
Qu'elle devrait porter un bébé
pendant neuf mois.

translation.en: She's gonna have to walk away from work after all she's accomplished.
translation.fr:
Et quitter son travail
après tous ses efforts.

translation.en: She's gonna wake up 10 times a night to feed and change the kid
translation.fr: Et se réveiller dix fois par nuit

translation.en: because you're always off doing this.
translation.fr: parce que tu n'es jamais là.

translation.en: She heard all that with "maybe"? Yes.
translation.fr:
- Elle a entendu tout ça ?
- Oui.

translation.en: ELSON: I don't know. No, no, no, dude.
translation.fr:
Je ne sais pas. Non, j'ai toujours
un message d'erreur.

translation.en: It just keeps coming up with an error.
translation.fr:
Non, j'ai toujours
un message d'erreur.

translation.en: I don't know. It's some sort of remote-access bug. Have you ever seen it?
translation.fr:
C'est une sorte de bug à distance.
Tu as déjà eu ça ?

translation.en: Yeah, I tried that. I tried that.
Oh, are you kidding me?
Yes, I had that in the queue. While we're young.
translation.fr:
- J'y ai pensé.
- Quand tu veux.

translation.en: I gotta go.
Please don't touch that.
What do you got?
Our friend Diego is a bad, bad dude.
translation.fr: Notre ami Diego est un sale type.

translation.en: From Honduras, okay?
Joined the Sao Paulo Locos, known as the S.P.L., when he was 6.
translation.fr:
Il a rejoint les Locos, les SPL,
à six ans.

translation.en: He's now a friggin' lieutenant.
Okay. What about our mystery man?
translation.fr:
- Et notre homme mystère ?
- Le Scorpion ?

translation.en: Scorpion? Is that what we're calling him?
translation.fr:
- Et notre homme mystère ?
- Le Scorpion ? On l'appelle comme ça ?

translation.en: Yeah, for now.
Nada on him. He's not in any active database.
translation.fr: Rien dans notre base de données.

translation.en: What about other databases?
translation.fr: Et dans les autres bases de données ?

translation.en: Such as? FBI? CIA? DoD?
translation.fr:
- Comme quoi ?
- Le FBI ? La CIA ? La Défense ?

translation.en: I don't have clearance to tap those.
But you could probably do it without clearance, right?
translation.fr:
Mais tu pourrais y accéder
sans autorisation.

translation.en: Are you asking me or telling me?
There's no way a guy protected by S.P.L.'s best is a ghost.
translation.fr:
Un type aussi protégé
ne peut pas être un fantôme.

translation.en: Just find out who he is.
You got it, boss.
Hey, put Diego in room one.
Get him to talk, have Ward listen in. What are you gonna do?
translation.fr:
- Fais-le parler.
- Tu vas faire quoi ?

translation.en: I'm gonna go talk to...Scorpion.
Dwyer's gonna lose her shit.
Let me worry about Dwyer.
Hey, Diego. We meet again.
You broke my fucking arm.
I gave you the choice to have your arm broken or not.
translation.fr: Je vous ai laissé le choix.

translation.en: You chose poorly.
Now, explain something to me.
Why would a lieutenant be put on babysitting duty?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi un lieutenant
fait la nounou ?

translation.en: Did they demote you, Diego?
Go fuck yourself, puta.
Who's the man in the box? You wanna know who he is?
translation.fr:
- Qui est l'homme dans la boîte ?
- Qui ?

translation.en: That's who he is. He's the fucking devil!
translation.fr: Voilà qui il est. Il est le diable.

translation.en: Want something to drink?
You need a medic? It's a holiday, but I could have it arranged.
translation.fr:
Vous avez besoin d'un médecin.
Ça peut s'arranger.

translation.en: Am I being charged with a crime?
That depends.
On...? Who are you?
Have you asked Diego who I am?
What's that?
He said that this was going to happen.
translation.fr: Il avait dit que ça arriverait.

translation.en: He said they'd come and he'd escape.
Who would escape? Diego--
You're all fucking dead. You don't know it.
translation.fr:
Vous êtes morts.
Mais vous l'ignorez.

translation.en: You tell them I did this, okay?
You tell them I did this.
Hey, stop.
Diego, stop! Help!
I need some help in here!
Perhaps you should attend to that.
SOPHIA: Stop it.
Oh, God.
What the fuck happened?
He just impaled himself.
TRAVIS: You're kidding me.
Fuck me.
Who the fuck are you?
You have blood on your hands.
Answer the question.
Did you kill him?
He killed himself.
Cracked his skull wide open.
We do not have much time.
I'm not asking again.
What is important is that you listen.
translation.fr: Il est important que vous écoutiez.

translation.en: You may think the events of today were in error,
translation.fr: Vous pouvez croire à une erreur,

translation.en: but I assure you, my friend, they were not.
translation.fr: mais il n'en est rien, mon ami.

translation.en: You better start answering my questions.
I have information in my head worth billions of dollars.
translation.fr:
J'ai des informations dans ma tête
qui valent des milliards.

translation.en: What kind of information?
The kind that can set the world on fire.
translation.fr: Le genre à embraser le monde.

translation.en: Jesus Christ, enough with the fucking riddles.
translation.fr:
J'en ai assez
de vos foutues énigmes.

translation.en: Fine. Here is the truth.
Very soon, you will be told that officers
translation.fr:
On va bientôt vous dire
que des agents fédéraux sont ici

translation.en: from a federal agency are here to take me into custody.
translation.fr:
On va bientôt vous dire
que des agents fédéraux sont ici pour m'emmener.

translation.en: They are not what they say they are.
translation.fr: Ils ne sont pas ce qu'ils prétendent.

translation.en: Do not let these men take me.
translation.fr: Ne laissez pas ces hommes m'emmener.

translation.en: Do this, and I will help you to survive what is coming next.
translation.fr:
Faites ça, et je vous aiderai
à survivre à la suite.

translation.en: FBI's here for him now. What?
I told you I had calls in.
We're handing him over, so we can all go home.
translation.fr:
On leur remet
et on rentre tous chez nous.

translation.en: Did they say who he was? A known terrorist.
Someone they've been after for a while.
translation.fr: Ils le traquent depuis un moment.

translation.en: Where are they? Lobby.
I'll take care of it.
I'll bring them to him, pass him off.
Gentlemen, you're here for the prisoner.
Commander Hall. I'm Agent Franklin. My partner, Agent Cox.
translation.fr:
Je suis l'agent Franklin.
Voici l'agent Cox.

translation.en: Sorry for the delay. No problem.
translation.fr:
- On a tardé.
- Ce n'est rien.

translation.en: We appreciate you hanging on to our guy.
Right this way.
That's funny, I thought all you FBI guys used Berettas.
translation.fr:
Le FBI utilise des Beretta
d'habitude.

translation.en: These are our personal weapons.
On the job? It's a holiday.
translation.fr:
- En service ?
- C'est un jour férié.

translation.en: So what'd this guy do to get on your database, anyway?
translation.fr:
Qu'a fait ce type pour être
dans votre base de données ?

translation.en: Terrorist stuff. Things we're not to discuss.
translation.fr:
- Du terrorisme.
- On ne peut rien dire.

translation.en: "Terrorist stuff." What's his name?
Heh. Come on. His name can't be a matter of national security.
translation.fr:
Son nom n'est pas une affaire
de sécurité nationale.

translation.en: Well, look, it's clear you guys aren't FBI, so no fooling.
translation.fr:
Clairement, vous n'êtes pas du FBI,
alors soyons francs.

translation.en: Who are you?
Just hand the prisoner over.
Not until I get some answers.
You are dead, motherfucker.
Drop the knife now! Now! Oh, fuck.
translation.fr:
- Jetez le couteau !
- Tout de suite !

translation.en: CHU: Hands on your head.
Knees.
You all right, Commander? Prick.
Got him? Yeah, we got him.
Commander? Commander!
You trust me now?
CHU: Hooks.
Hands on your head.
Let's go.
You all right, Commander? Yeah, yeah.
WARD: Keep moving.
Keys, cowboy.
I'm going to enjoy watching you die.
translation.fr:
Je vais me délecter
en te regardant mourir.

translation.en: Shut the fuck up.
Everything happened the way he said it would.
Our mystery man's not even in the FBI's database.
translation.fr:
Il n'est même pas
dans la base de données du FBI.

translation.en: Wait. How do you know that?
translation.fr:
Il n'est même pas
dans la base de données du FBI. Comment vous le savez ?

translation.en: You hacked the FBI database?
Just a bit.
Look, on the way to the shipping center,
translation.fr: Sur la route, j'ai dit à Weir

translation.en: I made a crack to Agent Weir about this being the calm before the storm,
translation.fr:
que c'était le calme
avant la tempête. Il a dit

translation.en: and he said there wasn't gonna be a storm.
translation.fr: qu'il n'y aurait pas de tempête.

translation.en: I don't think they were expecting any resistance,
which is odd, don't you think? It doesn't matter.
There is a protocol we need to follow-- Oh, fuck the protocol, Ellen!
translation.fr:
- On suit le protocole...
- On emmerde le protocole !

translation.en: This isn't the end of it.
We lost enough guys today. I don't wanna lose more.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas perdre d'autres gars.

translation.en: You're a cop, right? At least you were before you put the jacket on.
translation.fr:
Tu es flic, non ?
Du moins, tu l'étais avant.

translation.en: What does your gut tell you?
Let's see what he has to say.
translation.fr: Ecoutons ce qu'il a à dire.

translation.en: TRAVIS: You know this man?
He actually just tried to kill me to get to you.
translation.fr: Il a tenté de me tuer pour vous avoir.

translation.en: SCORPION: I've never seen him before, but I know more like him will be coming.
translation.fr:
Je ne l'ai jamais vu,
mais d'autres viendront.

translation.en: Many more. Why won't you tell us your name?
That is for your protection.
The less you know... TRAVIS: Well...
translation.fr:
- Moins vous en savez...
- Votre tatouage

translation.en: The ink on your back's not Sao Paulo Locos,
translation.fr: n'a rien à voir avec les Locos,

translation.en: nor does it rep any of their rivals, so you're clearly not a part of that game.
translation.fr:
ni avec leurs rivaux,
vous n'appartenez donc pas à un gang.

translation.en: My guess is you're Special Ops.
You've been tortured, from the looks of it, more than once.
translation.fr: Vous avez été torturé, plus d'une fois.

translation.en: You could have easily escaped our compound,
translation.fr:
Vous auriez pu vous échapper,
mais vous n'en avez rien fait.

translation.en: but you chose not to. Why?
translation.fr:
Vous auriez pu vous échapper,
mais vous n'en avez rien fait. Pourquoi ?
Vous avez besoin de nous,

translation.en: You need our protection
translation.fr:
Pourquoi ?
Vous avez besoin de nous,

translation.en: because everyone and their mother's coming after you
translation.fr:
pour vous protéger
de ceux qui sont après vous,

translation.en: because what you know
translation.fr: parce que ce que vous savez

translation.en: could cause blowback.
It is far more complicated than that.
translation.fr: C'est bien plus compliqué que ça.

translation.en: Fill me in here. What am I missing?
Because I believe you when you say more like him are coming.
translation.fr: Je vous crois, d'autres vont venir.

translation.en: But you're gonna have to square-up with me
if you want us to do more than just turn you over.
translation.fr: si vous ne voulez pas qu'on vous livre.

translation.en: You were correct about Special Ops,
translation.fr:
Vous avez raison
pour les Forces spéciales,

translation.en: but that was only in the beginning.
I quickly realized that information was true power.
translation.fr:
J'ai compris
que l'information était le pouvoir.

translation.en: So you're a spy. And I have the goods on everyone.
translation.fr:
- Vous êtes un espion.
- Et j'en sais beaucoup.

translation.en: What is it?
I traced the cell phone. LARS: Who is it?
I don't have a "who",
but I have where the call originated from.
translation.fr: mais j'ai la provenance de l'appel.

translation.en: Okay. So, what happened? How'd you end up in our cell?
translation.fr:
Comment avez-vous atterri
dans notre cellule ?

translation.en: made a mistake in Bogotá.
So why'd they capture you? Why not kill you?
To facilitate my sale.
ELLEN: Bullshit. The S.P.L. knows their lane.
translation.fr:
Foutaises. Les SPL ne trempent pas
dans ce genre de trafic.

translation.en: They're not dumb enough to trade in that game.
translation.fr:
Les SPL ne trempent pas
dans ce genre de trafic.

translation.en: No, but others do.
Who, then? Unsure.
SCORPION: But one thing I am sure of:
Someone from your team is involved.
translation.fr: un membre de votre équipe est impliqué.

translation.en: LARS: Nicholas, who are these people?
Show me who we're up against.
translation.fr: Montre-moi à qui on a affaire.

translation.en: Where you going, Travis?
Commander? I'm moving him.
Where?
Not alone. The team should be in on this.
Just me. What, are you crazy?
That doesn't make any sense. Nothing about today makes sense.
translation.fr:
- C'est absurde.
- Cette journée est absurde.

translation.en: If I tell you where I'm going,
translation.fr: Si je te dis où je vais,

translation.en: they could get it out of you. They wouldn't be able to.
translation.fr:
- ils te feront parler.
- Ils ne pourront pas.

translation.en: They're coming for him, Sof,
and they're not gonna stop.
I won't let another person I care about die today.
translation.fr:
Je ne laisserai
personne d'autre mourir.

translation.en: If they know he's here, they could be watching the compound, and--
I'll have Elson review the area.
Thanks.
I'm moving you.
Moving me will not keep them from coming for me.
translation.fr:
Ça ne les empêchera pas
de me traquer.

translation.en: No, but it'll keep them from my team,
translation.fr:
Non, mais ça les éloignera
de mon équipe,

translation.en: and that's my priority.
It's how it's gotta be.
Yo, Commander, what's going on?
Hey. Just saw Hall taking Scorpion out.
translation.fr:
Je viens de voir Hall
emmener le Scorpion.

translation.en: What do you mean, "out"?
It's him.
Hello? MAN [ALTERED VOICE]: Listen to me carefully.
You don't have much time.
How we looking?
Yeah, yeah. Everything looks good. No unusual activity.
translation.fr:
Tout va bien.
Pas d'activité inhabituelle.

translation.en: SOPHIA: "Remote access error." What is that?
ELSON: That? I don't know.
That has been bugging me all day.
translation.fr: Ça me perturbe depuis ce matin.

translation.en: MAN [ON COMM]: I'm in position.
Did you disable the camera that shows our sniper?
translation.fr:
La caméra qui montre notre sniper
est désactivée ?

translation.en: What I did was record footage before he got there,
translation.fr: J'ai enregistré des images sans lui,

translation.en: and just have it playing back on a continuous loop.
translation.fr: et je les diffuse en boucle continue.

translation.en: A simple "yes" would suffice.
Is he clear? Yes.
Yes.
Think they're watching? They are definitely watching.
Travis, stop!
What are you doing?
You said you didn't want anyone else to die.
translation.fr: Tu ne voulais pas d'autres morts.

translation.en: Yeah, and that included you.
I'll radio when I'm safe.
TRAVIS: Let's go.
I was personally put in charge of Glen Damone's protection. Know who that is?
translation.fr:
J'ai protégé Glen Damone.
Vous le connaissez ?

translation.en: The mafia accountant.
Trial lasted five months, no less than 20 bounties on his head.
translation.fr:
Cinq mois de procès,
vingt tueurs à ses trousses.

translation.en: He never got one scratch under my watch.
Wait. Wasn't he assassinated shortly after the trial?
translation.fr:
Il n'a pas été assassiné
juste après le procès ?

translation.en: That was on Witness Protection, not me.
translation.fr: La faute à la Protection des témoins.

translation.en: Watch your head.
When they clear the compound, take out the driver.
translation.fr:
Quand ils sortent,
abattez le chauffeur.

translation.en: If anyone kills Scorpion, they die next. MAN [ON COMM]: Roger that.
translation.fr:
- Celui qui tue le Scorpion est mort.
- Bien reçu.

translation.en: MAN: They're leaving the facility. Take him out.
You'd be wise to take cover. What?
Duck!
Oh, shit. They're under attack.
We gotta go. WARD: Let's move!
Where are you going? To help.
You're not field. Help from here. Find out where the backup is!
WOMAN: Dispatch. This is Seattle S.W.A.T.
We're under heavy attack and need immediate assistance.
translation.fr:
On nous attaque.
Envoyez de l'aide.

translation.en: WOMAN: Roger that, Seattle S.W.A.T.
Hang tight.
Backup's on its way.
SCORPION: Commander?
Go! Go! Go!
I've got the shot.
Not on my shift, motherfucker.
translation.fr: Pas quand je suis de garde, enfoiré.

translation.en: Fuck!
Do not let him get away!
Commander, nice of you to join us.
TRAVIS: Son of a bitch.
Back to the compound. Move it. Now!
Holy fuck.
MAN 1: Left, left, left.
Clear. MAN 2: Clear! Go!
Get the truck out.
Everyone, inside! Gutierrez, I'm on the move!
translation.fr:
- A l'intérieur.
- Gutierrez. - J'arrive.
- On bouge !

translation.en: Go, go!
Dwyer, shut us down!
I'm on it. Shut us down now!
What part of "we need him alive" do they not understand?
translation.fr: Je le veux en vie, ils sont bouchés ?

translation.en: Are those shields?
Well, you have to admire their resilience.
Nicholas,
can you open them?
It's one thing to hack their comms and cameras,
but shields are controlled by the internal mainframe.
It'd need to be taken out before I can do anything.
LARS: Find a way past those shields.
Leave the rest to me. In the meantime, kill the power.
translation.fr:
Je me charge du reste.
Coupe le courant.

translation.en: Kill everything.
Ready the next wave, and let's see how resilient they truly are.
translation.fr:
A la prochaine vague,
on verra s'ils sont tenaces.

translation.en: Got that?
TRAVIS: Where's the backup, Elson?
What the fuck happened?
Hold up, hold up. What are you doing?
I assure you, Inspector, what's out there is far more dangerous to you than me.
translation.fr:
Ceux qui sont dehors
sont bien plus dangereux que moi.

translation.en: They're only dangerous to us because of you.
You brought this to our door, all of it, and I can end it right now.
translation.fr:
Vous les avez amenés ici,
et je peux y mettre fin.

translation.en: And you think killing me will stop this war?
translation.fr: Et me tuer arrêtera cette guerre ?

translation.en: Ellen, this isn't who we are.
translation.fr: Ellen, ce n'est pas notre style.

translation.en: Now what? What's going on, Elson?
translation.fr:
- Quoi ?
- Il se passe quoi, Elson ?

translation.en: ELSON: Yeah, they cut the comm and power, and judging by the signal on my cell,
translation.fr:
Ils ont coupé les communications
et le courant,

translation.en: they're jamming the cell tower too.
translation.fr:
- et ils brouillent les antennes.
- Merde.

translation.en: Fuck. Any satellite phones on-site?
translation.fr:
- et ils brouillent les antennes.
- Merde. On a des téléphones satellite ?

translation.en: ELSON: Yeah, none that are working.
Why are cameras working but not Internet or phones?
translation.fr: Déroutage des flux Pourquoi les caméras fonctionnent ?

translation.en: In cases like this, you wanna see.
So we put security separate on the internal mainframe.
And they would want to see as well.
They hacked the security cameras.
They can do that? It's not that hard.
For somebody who's good enough, it's not.
TRAVIS: Cut the interior security cameras.
Don't let them see what we're doing.
translation.fr:
- Qu'ils ne nous voient pas.
- D'accord.

translation.en: ELSON: Copy that.
translation.fr:
- Qu'ils ne nous voient pas.
- D'accord. Caméras
Intérieur

translation.en: SCORPION: You must get this through your skulls.
translation.fr: PAS DE SIGNAL VIDÉO Mettez-vous ça dans le crâne.

translation.en: These are professional soldiers. They will isolate you, intimidate you
translation.fr:
Ce sont des pros.
Ils vont vous isoler, vous intimider,

translation.en: until they find your weakest link and then exploit it.
I thought you said the phones were out. They are.
translation.fr:
- Les téléphones ne sont pas coupés ?
- Si.

translation.en: TRAVIS [ON PHONE]: Hello?
Commander Hall?
I'm the man in control of the small army sitting on your doorstep.
translation.fr:
Je contrôle la petite armée
qui est à votre porte.

translation.en: Do you have a moment to chat?
If you want me on speaker, go ahead. I understand.
translation.fr:
Vous pouvez me mettre
sur haut-parleur.

translation.en: Everyone should hear.
I should've done this earlier.
translation.fr: J'aurais dû faire ça plus tôt.

translation.en: It would've saved us all a lot of time, sweat
translation.fr:
On aurait tous économisé
du temps, de la sueur

translation.en: and blood.
I have your compound surrounded.
Your power, your network,
all of your communications are down.
No one knows that you're in trouble, and no one's coming to help.
translation.fr:
Personne n'est en route
pour vous aider.

translation.en: Your officer spoke to my associate, Simone,
translation.fr:
Votre supérieure a parlé
à mon associée, Simone,

translation.en: not the dispatch operator.
Hello.
The man you pulled out of a box belongs to me.
Hand him over
and I'll go away.
Just like that?
Just like that.
Can't do it.
Scorpion...
I know you're listening.
Tell these people who I am.
translation.fr: Dis à ces gens qui je suis.

translation.en: His name is Lars Cohagen.
He runs a private military corporation
that specializes in dark ops. The kind that overthrow small countries?
translation.fr:
- d'opérations clandestines.
- Qui renverse de petits pays ?

translation.en: Some not so small. Hm.
Now that we're all in the know,
why don't you come on out and spare the lives of these nice people?
translation.fr:
alors pourquoi ne pas épargner
la vie de ces gens ?

translation.en: Let them return home and enjoy what's left of the holiday.
translation.fr:
Qu'ils profitent
du reste de leur congé.

translation.en: They could still catch the fireworks.
How many times are we going to go through this?
translation.fr: On va faire ça encore longtemps ?

translation.en: This is it.
This is our last dance.
I've heard this before.
Commander Hall, the man you're protecting is a consummate liar.
translation.fr:
L'homme que vous protégez
est un menteur invétéré.

translation.en: His skills of deception supersede even mine.
In fact, I will guarantee that he's lying to you right now.
translation.fr:
Je vous garantis qu'il vous ment
en ce moment même.

translation.en: Has he told you there's one in your organization that's against you?
translation.fr:
Il a dit que l'un des vôtres
vous trahissait ?

translation.en: Or that he has information that could set the world ablaze?
translation.fr:
Ou que ses informations
embraseraient le monde ?

translation.en: He's a liar
and a killer and nothing more.
All your problems go away if you just
turn him over.
And I already told you,
I'm not doing that.
Commander, so this stranger's life
translation.fr:
Commandant, la vie de cet inconnu
compte plus que votre équipe ?

translation.en: is more important to you than your team's?
translation.fr:
la vie de cet inconnu
compte plus que votre équipe ?

translation.en: What about Daniel Chu?
David Jefferson?
Luis and Maria Gutierrez?
Carley and Rebecca?
Is Scorpion's life worth more to you than their lives?
translation.fr:
Le Scorpion vaut plus
que leurs vies ?

translation.en: Are all their lives worth Scorpion's to you?
translation.fr:
Toutes leurs vies
valent celle du Scorpion ?

translation.en: Enough. I'm coming out.
But before I do,
I want your guarantee.
No harm comes to anyone here, nor their families.
translation.fr:
Tu ne t'en prendras ni à eux
ni à leurs familles.

translation.en: You have my word.
I will be out in 10 minutes.
You'd better be.
ELSON: Commander, try the phone again. Maybe we have a live line out.
translation.fr:
Réessayez le téléphone.
On a peut-être une ligne.

translation.en: Shit.
TRAVIS: You're not giving yourself up.
translation.fr:
- Ne vous rendez pas.
- Je n'ai pas dit ça.

translation.en: I never said I was. I only said I was coming out.
translation.fr:
- Ne vous rendez pas.
- Je n'ai pas dit ça. J'ai dit que je sortais.

translation.en: You think you can take on this whole army alone? I work best alone.
translation.fr:
- Les battre seul ?
- Je suis meilleur en solo.

translation.en: With the shields down, this place can withstand a riot.
translation.fr: Cet endroit peut tenir une émeute.

translation.en: You don't have to go.
WARD: Hold on a second. I'm confused.
You giving yourself up or not? He's not.
We can't let him. HOOKS: Yes, we can.
Did you not see that army out there?
We just lost Phil and Benson.
translation.fr: On a perdu Phil et Benson.

translation.en: I don't plan to join them because of this son of a bitch.
translation.fr:
Je ne les rejoindrai pas
pour cet enfoiré.

translation.en: You heard him, Commander.
He's threatening our families, and there's no backup.
translation.fr:
Il nous menace,
il n'y a pas de renforts.

translation.en: This guy's a fucking liar. He could be playing us. Let him go.
translation.fr:
Ce type se fout de nous.
On le laisse partir.

translation.en: No. We're not giving in to this Lars asshole.
translation.fr: Non. On ne va pas céder.

translation.en: Not after all that's happened.
It ain't his fault a lunatic's shooting up the building.
Maybe it is. We don't know.
Scorpion could've escaped or killed us several times.
translation.fr:
Le Scorpion aurait pu fuir
ou nous tuer.

translation.en: He didn't. I believe him.
That just might mean that he needed our help to survive.
translation.fr:
Parce qu'il avait besoin
de notre aide.

translation.en: That doesn't disprove what Lars said.
Believe Lars when he says he will stop at nothing
translation.fr: Rien n'arrêtera Lars s'il veut entrer

translation.en: to find a way inside to get me.
If I do not come out now, that army outside,
translation.fr: Si je ne sors pas, cette armée,

translation.en: those phony agents,
they are just the tip of the iceberg.
translation.fr:
ce n'est que la partie émergée
de l'iceberg.

translation.en: You're right.
We'll put you by the back door.
Only it won't be you.
translation.fr: Mais ce ne sera pas vous.

translation.en: Heh. In theory, it should work. I loaded everything you'll need on the laptop.
translation.fr:
Ça devrait marcher.
Tout est sur le portable.

translation.en: You should be good to go.
I wanna thank you for your assistance today, Nicholas.
Oh, my pleasure, sir.
Did you know that Scorpion and I used to be partners?
translation.fr:
Tu sais que le Scorpion
a été mon associé ?

translation.en: Right. You were saying.
It was great for a while,
and then five years ago in Berlin, he betrayed me.
translation.fr:
et il y a cinq ans, à Berlin,
il m'a trahi.

translation.en: After all we'd been through.
translation.fr: Après tout ce qu'on avait vécu.

translation.en: You know, and I knew it.
I knew something was wrong, but I didn't react in time.
translation.fr: mais je n'ai pas réagi à temps.

translation.en: Since then, I've taken greater precaution in my business dealings, because
translation.fr:
Depuis, je suis encore plus prudent
dans mes affaires,

translation.en: no matter how much you think you know someone,
translation.fr:
car même quand on pense
connaître quelqu'un,

translation.en: they could stab you in the back.
translation.fr:
il peut nous poignarder
dans le dos.

translation.en: Do you understand what I'm saying?
translation.fr: Tu comprends ce que je dis ?

translation.en: Yeah, I think so.
Good.
WARD: All right, let me get this straight.
You wanna raise the door shields and let the army in?
That's your plan? Not let them in. Lure them close, then ambush them.
translation.fr:
Les attirer pour leur tendre
une embuscade.

translation.en: Why won't that work?
Because it's batshit crazy.
TRAVIS: We're not turning this man over to mercenaries.
translation.fr: On ne le livrera pas aux mercenaires.

translation.en: Once they're in the courtyard, we've got them trapped.
translation.fr: On les piègera dans la cour.

translation.en: How do you figure that?
The back door is located in the deepest part of the courtyard.
translation.fr:
La porte arrière
est au fond de la cour.

translation.en: Here.
Now, about three dozen office windows look down onto it.
translation.fr:
Surplombée
par des dizaines de fenêtres.

translation.en: That's where we'll be.
We'll make them think we're handing you over.
To sell it, Elson will figure out a way to open the rear entrance shield.
translation.fr:
Pour ça, Elson ouvrira
le bouclier de la porte arrière.

translation.en: Now, once they get eyes on the bait,
they're gonna move in underneath our hidden positions,
translation.fr: ils se placeront sous nos positions,

translation.en: and that's when we hit 'em.
They'll be sitting ducks.
It's the first time the shields have ever been activated.
translation.fr: On n'avait jamais activé les boucliers.

translation.en: I've never done, nor am I even sure
that isolated openings will work as you describe them.
translation.fr: si je peux en ouvrir un seul.

translation.en: Yeah. Well, you'll figure it out.
They'll be expecting something like that.
TRAVIS: Well, this is our only option.
They got us boxed in.
We can't call out, and you said it yourself.
translation.fr: On ne peut pas demander d'aide.

translation.en: It's only a matter of time till he finds his way in.
At least this way, it's on our own terms.
translation.fr: Au moins, on dicte nos règles.

translation.en: Look, guys, this isn't an order.
I'm not forcing you into this.
But I, for one, don't wanna sit around and let someone else determine my fate.
translation.fr:
Mais je ne laisserai pas quelqu'un
décider de mon destin.

translation.en: If I'm going out,
it's gonna be on my terms, not theirs.
translation.fr:
ce sera sous mes conditions,
pas les leurs.

translation.en: If this is what you want, I will need firepower.
translation.fr:
Dans ce cas,
il me faut de la puissance de feu.

translation.en: TRAVIS: We've got every weapon known to man.
What exactly are you looking for?
I will know it when I see it. TRAVIS: We aim to please.
TRAVIS: In the meantime, spread out and load up.
Just because I'm browsing don't mean I'm giving up on you.
translation.fr: Je ne vais pas t'abandonner, chérie.

translation.en: What the fuck do you do with that?
You don't want anything to do with that.
That's when you got nothing to live for.
HOOKS: Hey.
Oh, never mind.
What did you find?
Excellent. WARD: Why?
Our regular radios still work.
He may have tapped into those frequencies. He will not be able to do so with this model.
translation.fr:
Il a pu capter les fréquences.
Il ne pourra pas avec ce modèle.

translation.en: Okay. Everyone grab one.
You gotta change.
TRAVIS: How'd you get the name Scorpion, anyway?
I assume that's not on your birth certificate.
translation.fr:
Ce n'est pas
sur votre certificat de naissance.

translation.en: SCORPION: You are assuming I have a birth certificate.
translation.fr: Si j'ai un certificat de naissance.

translation.en: Heh. All right, you're not gonna tell me your name.
translation.fr: Si j'ai un certificat de naissance. Vous ne me direz pas votre nom.

translation.en: At least you can tell me how you know Lars Cohagen.
translation.fr:
Mais dites-moi ce que vous savez
sur Lars Cohagen.

translation.en: We were once partners.
I never said I was a good man, Commander, just good at what I do.
translation.fr:
Je ne suis pas un homme bon,
juste un homme doué.

translation.en: You do not know me, Commander.
You should not be taking this risk.
Even holiday double-time ain't enough to deal with this shit today.
translation.fr:
Même avec la prime,
ça ne vaut pas le coup.

translation.en: You know, the job is risk.
It's not about or for you.
translation.fr: Je ne fais pas ça pour vous.

translation.en: Not any longer.
Our guys' blood's been spilled today.
translation.fr: Le sang de nos hommes a été versé.

translation.en: Someone's gonna pay for that.
SCORPION: There is one thing you have not addressed.
translation.fr: Il vous reste un problème à régler.

translation.en: The person on the inside who is working against us.
translation.fr: La taupe qui travaille contre nous.

translation.en: When they attacked the van, they were waiting for us.
Someone told Lars you were taking me from the compound.
ELLEN [ON COMM]: Two-minute warning.
Copy that. Everyone get in position.
We go on my call. Copy that.
Good luck.
Never really believed in luck.
translation.fr: Je n'ai jamais cru à la chance.

translation.en: Well, good luck anyway.
Everyone set? Know what they're doing?
ALL: Yes, sir.
Sof, you remember Suffolk, a few years back?
Yeah.
That was another supposedly cakewalk mission
translation.fr:
Une autre mission
qui devait être du gâteau

translation.en: that turned into a shitshow.
What was it, 40 gangbangers against eight S.W.A.T.?
translation.fr:
Quarante membres de gang
contre huit SWAT ?

translation.en: I tell people I never know how we survived that night.
translation.fr:
Je dis que j'ignore
comment on a survécu.

translation.en: But I do know...
we're S.W.A.T.
We're the baddest motherfuckers on Earth.
translation.fr: Des putain de purs et durs.

translation.en: TRAVIS: Let's get in position.
Take care of each other.
The least he could've done was give us the microchip to barter for our lives.
translation.fr:
Il pourrait au moins
nous donner la micro-puce.

translation.en: There's no microchip. It's in his head.
Hey, make sure we're in position before--
Hey. It's not my first rodeo.
Don't fuck up.
How we looking?
When we get the go, I just hit enter, and it'll raise the rear-entrance shield.
translation.fr:
Au signal, je lèverai
le bouclier de l'entrée arrière.

translation.en: But not the rest of the building? Right. Just the rear entrance.
In theory.
In theory?
In theory.
MAN 1: Position! Hold that position!
MAN 2: All right, let's go.
MAN 1: Left, left, left.
SIMONE: No sign of Scorpion.
Commander, is your team ready?
Let's go around the horn.
Hooks, set.
Jefferson, set. York, set.
Gutierrez, set. Chu, set.
Ward, are you in position?
Sorry, I was using the wrong mic.
We're all set.
Raise the shield. Copy.
It worked.
SIMONE: Right on time.
They're opening the shields by the rear entrance. Move in.
translation.fr:
Ils ouvrent le bouclier à l'arrière.
Intervenez.

translation.en: TRAVIS [ON COMM]: Here they come. Get ready.
SIMONE: Third-floor window.
What is that?
Morse code.
Pull everyone back. It's a trap.
SIMONE [ON COMM]: Everyone move back. Now.
Whoa, whoa, whoa. He's stopping. Why is he stopping?
TRAVIS: The fuck just happened?
Everybody fall back to the command center.
ELLEN [ON COMM]: Copy. Everyone fall back.
Fuck.
Elson, close the rear shields. I'm on it.
translation.fr:
- Ferme les boucliers.
- Je m'en occupe.

translation.en: Where's everybody else? Ward, I don't know.
translation.fr:
- Ils sont où ?
- Ward, je ne sais pas.

translation.en: Scorpion's M.I.A.
Dwyer left a few minutes ago. Where?
We saw a light at the third-floor window
translation.fr: On a vu une lumière à une fenêtre

translation.en: and she just bolted. A flash of light?
translation.fr:
- et elle a filé.
- A quelle fenêtre ?

translation.en: Which window? Right there.
translation.fr:
- et elle a filé.
- A quelle fenêtre ? Juste là.

translation.en: Stay here. Keep an eye on everything outside.
Where are you going? Find the big guy.
translation.fr:
- Tu vas où ?
- Trouve notre gaillard.

translation.en: Scorpion, come in.
Scorpion, do you copy?
Get up.
I'm gonna let you out of here.
You're gonna tell Lars I'm gonna find another way to give him Scorpion.
translation.fr:
Dis à Lars
que je lui donnerai le Scorpion.

translation.en: No one else needs to die.
Shit, it was you.
Yeah, I'll tell him. Lead the way.
translation.fr: Je lui dirai. Je te suis.

translation.en: WARD: The amount is the same upon delivery. Fifty million. That hasn't changed.
translation.fr:
Le prix n'a pas changé.
Cinquante millions.

translation.en: Fifty million's a sweet fucking payday for a cop.
translation.fr: Une bonne paie pour un flic.

translation.en: Those DEA assholes are always skimming off the top.
translation.fr:
Les Stups se servent toujours
grassement.

translation.en: About time I got some. Of course, it is.
Hey. This mess is Hall's fault. If he had handed over Scorpion--
translation.fr:
- C'est mon tour.
- Bien sûr. Mais si Hall avait livré le Scorpion...

translation.en: What the hell's the plan on getting me out of here?
We're gonna cut the power to the mainframe.
Once the shields are up, Lars can take care of the rest.
Where are the controls? Engineering room.
Thanks.
Fuck.
TRAVIS: Ellen.
You all right? Yeah.
It was Ward.
I saw him talking to Franklin before Franklin killed him.
translation.fr: Je l'ai vu parler à Franklin.

translation.en: Where'd he go? In there.
translation.fr:
- Il est parti où ?
- Par là.

translation.en: Yeah? Ready?
See that?
CHU: What just happened? Security feed's been cut.
translation.fr:
- Qu'y a-t-il ?
- Le flux est coupé.

translation.en: We're blind outside now, too. You said the feed was internal.
translation.fr:
- On est aveugles.
- Ce n'est pas en interne ?

translation.en: It is.
Without it, I've lost control of our security system. What does that mean?
translation.fr:
- Je n'ai plus le contrôle.
- C'est-à-dire ?

translation.en: What I mean is the same crazy fuck that's been attacking us can open our shields,
translation.fr:
Le taré qui nous a attaqués
peut ouvrir les boucliers

translation.en: and there is nothing that we can do about it.
translation.fr: et on ne peut rien y faire.

translation.en: Closer.
Clear.
What the fuck is happening? The shields are raising.
YORK: Can you stop it? ELSON: No.
What do you think he's gonna fucking do, huh?
SIMONE: Intel from Berlin.
Dead or alive no longer matters.
I will go in there and fucking kill him myself if I have to!
translation.fr:
Je vais aller le buter moi-même
s'il le faut.

translation.en: Go!
Everyone, move in.
SIMONE [ON COMM]: Shoot to kill Scorpion on sight.
MAN: Let's go! Let's go!
Oh, shit.
Everyone fall back. Let's go. Come on.
TRAVIS: Go, go, go, go, go, go!
Elson, come on.
MAN: After those guys! Let's go!
TRAVIS: Clear!
Move, move, move, move!
YORK: Let's go! Let's go!
Man down!
HOOKS: Jefferson, come on!
Jefferson.
Go!
Later, bitches.
Get over yourself.
Let's go. Go.
Duck.
Oh, you meant that kind of firepower.
translation.fr: Ce genre de puissance de feu.

translation.en: SCORPION: I have something to show you.
translation.fr: J'ai un truc à vous montrer.

translation.en: The way out.
I found a maintenance tunnel.
TRAVIS: Yeah, it's been sealed.
SCORPION: Not anymore.
Nope. Fuck that. Hey, it's either that,
or you go back out there to face a bunch of badass dudes shooting at you.
translation.fr: ou tu retournes te faire canarder.

translation.en: All right, give me a boost. Okay.
ELSON: Fuck.
CHU: Right behind you, Elson. ELSON: Okay.
Travis. I'm going after Dwyer.
No way I'm leaving one of our own behind.
Get 'em to safety, okay?
You don't know how many of them are still up there.
translation.fr: Tu ne sais pas combien il en reste.

translation.en: Or if she's even alive. I'm gonna be fine.
translation.fr:
- Ou si elle est en vie.
- Ça ira.

translation.en: Go on. I'm not letting you go alone.
He won't be.
I'll call for backup as soon as I can.
You don't have to do this. I know.
translation.fr:
- Vous n'êtes pas obligé.
- Je sais.

translation.en: You didn't have to come back just for us.
translation.fr: Il ne fallait pas revenir pour nous.

translation.en: I didn't.
TRAVIS: Looks like everybody cleared out.
SCORPION: Unlikely.
Lars would never give up.
At least I got you.
Now let us see if you can finish the job.
Hey.
[SIGHS] Hey.
What happened? It's over.
translation.fr:
- Il s'est passé quoi ?
- C'est fini.

translation.en: Good guys won. Come on.
TRAVIS: We lost York and Jefferson.
translation.fr: On a perdu York et Jefferson.

translation.en: ELLEN: Oh, God, no. TRAVIS: Yeah.
ELLEN: What about Scorpion? TRAVIS: Yeah, he's still alive...
translation.fr:
- Et le Scorpion ?
- Il est encore en vie,

translation.en: somehow.
Still no signal? TRAVIS: No.
Gutierrez said she'd call it in when they got out.
TRAVIS: Cell towers must still be jammed.
But it shouldn't be too long now,
translation.fr: mais ça ne sera pas long.

translation.en: which means you need to disappear.
I don't know if I have it in me to run anymore.
translation.fr: Je n'ai plus envie de fuir.

translation.en: I am constantly running.
That and all the people trying to kill me...
translation.fr: Et tous ces tueurs après moi,

translation.en: It's exhausting. [CHUCKLES]
You got all that money in your head. Why not just retire?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi vous ne prenez pas
votre retraite ?

translation.en: That is blood money.
As a matter of fact...
Dude, what the fuck?
Take it.
What the hell is it?
SCORPION: It's what all the fuss is about.
translation.fr: La raison de tout ce foutoir.

translation.en: A microchip.
What's in your head. That's clever.
And now it's better in your hands.
translation.fr: Elle est mieux entre vos mains.

translation.en: ELLEN: Late last night, a shipping container arrived at Monfell from Bogotá.
translation.fr:
Cette nuit, un conteneur
est arrivé de Bogotá.

translation.en: Yeah, what'd he turn out to be? A guy in a box.
translation.fr:
Et c'était quoi ?
Un type dans une boîte.

translation.en: ELLEN: The least he could've done was given us the microchip to barter for our lives.
translation.fr:
Il pourrait au moins
nous donner la micro-puce.

translation.en: TRAVIS: There's no microchip.
translation.fr: Il n'y a pas de micro-puce.

translation.en: Ellen, what are you doing? It's nothing personal, Travis.
translation.fr:
- Tu fais quoi ?
- Je n'ai rien contre toi.

translation.en: ELLEN: You should have just handed Scorpion over, Travis.
translation.fr: Tu aurais dû livrer le Scorpion.

translation.en: No one was supposed to get hurt. You should've just let it go.
translation.fr:
Personne ne devait être blessé.
Il fallait céder.

translation.en: Don't.
Don't.
It's over.
MAN: What did I say?
Good? Yeah.
SOPHIA: FBI was onto her.
And she knew.
I never liked her.
What is that?
A souvenir.
MAN: Excuse me, Commander.
Can I ask you to come and identify the body?
MAN: Is this the man known as Scorpion?
That's-- That's him.
MAN: Okay. Take him away, guys.
Is there something you wanna tell me?
translation.fr: Tu as un truc à me dire ?

translation.en: TRAVIS: Yeah, but for your protection, I'd better not.
translation.fr: Pour ta sécurité, je préfère éviter.

translation.en: The less you know...
TRAVIS [ON PHONE]: Hey, hon.
How's the party going? CARLEY: Travis, oh, my God.
translation.fr:
- La fête se passe bien ?
- Travis.

translation.en: I've been worried sick. Are you okay? TRAVIS: Yeah, I'm-- I'm fine. I'm on my way.
translation.fr:
- J'étais folle d'inquiétude. Ça va ?
- Oui. J'arrive.

translation.en: I'll tell you about it when I get up there, okay? I love you.
translation.fr:
Je te raconterai quand je serai là.
Je t'aime.

translation.en: CARLEY: Purple. BECKY: P-U-R-P-L-E.
CARLEY: Three. BECKY: One, two, three.
Four. Four.
Hi, Daddy.
Hi, sweetheart. Oh. You look like you could use a beer.
translation.fr:
- Ma chérie.
- Tu as besoin d'une bière.

translation.en: Or 20.
Hey, what's this? Hey.
Yeah.
TRAVIS: This is enough.
For me.
Just you...
and her.
I don't need anything more.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas besoin de plus.

translation.en: But I'm pregnant.
Are you kidding me? Surprise.
TRAVIS: Is that what you were trying to tell me? Yeah.
translation.fr: C'est ce que tu voulais me dire ?

translation.en: Did you know about this?
Yeah, I could tell.
The two of you...
TRAVIS [ON PHONE]: Hall here.
MAN [ON PHONE]: Commander, we got a shitshow brewing
translation.fr:
Ici Hall. On a une situation de crise
au capitole à Olympia.

translation.en: at the capitol building in downtown Olympia.
translation.fr:
On a une situation de crise
au capitole à Olympia.

translation.en: We need you and your team on-scene ASAP.
translation.fr:
On a besoin de votre équipe
le plus vite possible.

translation.en: Closed Captions: Katie Radford
